arts.ttl: 'At that point': Russell Martin shares what he did in the dressing room at half-time during Soton v Tottenham
arts.sum: Russell Martin lost his job at Southampton after his side were hammered by Tottenham. Martin stood on in disbelief as his Southampton side capitulated inside...

arts.ttl: 'Sublime': Joe Cole names the 'brilliant' player who actually makes Tottenham 'tick' in Southampton win
Aaron Ramsdale's Djed Spence and Archie Gray Tottenham words backfire as Daniel Levy message sent
arts.sum: It has been evident in recent games that Porro requires a rest, with the Spaniard only getting 28 minutes on the touchline ahead of Thursday evening's vital Carabao Cup quarter-final tie against Manchester United due to Udogie's first-half injury. Timo Werner was one of those to drop out the starting XI from the Rangers game, which wasn't that much of a surprise to Tottenham fans going on his half-time substitution and the head coach's post-match comments .

arts.ttl: Tottenham player ratings vs Southampton with Maddison and Son brilliant as Sarr and Spence impress
arts.sum: Destiny Udogie won the ball back in his own half, sprinted up the pitch, found Son and the skipper picked out the run of Pape Matar Sarr and the young midfielder dribbled around a defender and fired home on the slide. Eighteen-year-old midfielder Archie Gray was again named alongside Radu Dragusin in the middle of the defence and another 18-year-old Lucas Bergvall and Djed Spence came in for their first Premier League starts.

arts.ttl: Postecoglou press conference LIVE - Spurs boss on Maddison, Son and Djed Spence
arts.sum: Destiny Udogie won the ball back in his own half, sprinted up the pitch, found Son and the skipper picked out the run of Pape Matar Sarr and the young midfielder dribbled around a defender and fired home on the slide. Tottenham made a remarkable start just 45 seconds in when a powerful run from Djed Spence through the middle of the pitch ended with a pinpoint ball poked through to James Maddison and the midfielder fired it through the keeper's legs and into the net.

arts.ttl: Southampton vs. Tottenham Hotspur: Son Heung-min breaks Premier League record held for 20 years
arts.sum: Son Heung-min has the most assists of any Tottenham Hotspur player in Premier League history, beating Darren Anderton's total following Spurs' win against Southampton.

arts.ttl: 'Absolutely brilliant' - How Maddison led Spurs to 5-0 thrashing
arts.sum: Match of the Day 2 pundits Shay Given and Danny Murphy discuss James Maddison's "absolutely brilliant" performance during Tottenham's 5-0 thrashing of Southampton.

arts.ttl: Southampton vs. Tottenham Hotspur: Southampton make major Russell Martin decision following Premier League defeat
arts.sum: Southampton sack manager Russell Martin following their defeat against Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Sunday night.
Ange was asked about Djed Spence and Lucas Bergvall, who made their first starts in the Premier League... First up, Ange was asked what he made of the performance, particularly our fast start...
